Material used.Description: Trp53 mutant mice were generated and studied for tumor susceptibility.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple Trp53 mutant mouse lines were used in the study.

Technical replicates.Description: Not applicable as this is a genetically modified model system.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice were used as controls for tumor susceptibility in the study.

Basic negative control.Description: Not applicable as this is a genetic study without specific manipulation of wild-type cells.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Comparative statistical analysis was performed between Trp53 mutant mice and wild-type controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Tumor incidence rate of wild-type mice serving as the reference.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Elevated tumor incidence or earlier onset of tumors in Trp53 mutant mice compared to wild-type controls.
